org.apache.juneau.serializer

Class OutputStreamSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Lockable
      • org.apache.juneau.CoreApi
        • org.apache.juneau.serializer.Serializer
          • org.apache.juneau.serializer.OutputStreamSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaSerializedObjectSerializer, MsgPackSerializer

    public abstract class OutputStreamSerializer
extends Serializer
    Subclass of Serializer for byte-based serializers.
    Description

    This class is typically the parent class of all byte-based serializers. It has 1 abstract method to implement...

    • Serializer.doSerialize(SerializerSession, Object)
    @Produces annotation

    The media types that this serializer can produce is specified through the @Produces annotation.

    However, the media types can also be specified programmatically by overriding the Serializer.getMediaTypes() and Serializer.getResponseContentType() methods.

    Author:
    James Bognar (james.bognar@salesforce.com)
